meanings.definition: The hard, aromatic seed of an East Indian tree, used as a spice in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added some nutmegs to the pumpkin pie for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: She bought nutmegs to use in her holiday baking.
meanings.sent3: The nutmegs in the spice rack were having a party.
meanings.sent4: The scent of nutmegs filled the kitchen, making it cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent5: As she grated the nutmegs, the warm aroma enveloped her senses.

meanings.definition: To grate or sprinkle nutmeg on food.
meanings.sent1: He nutmegs the eggnog before serving it at the party.
meanings.sent2: They always nutmeg the hot chocolate during winter.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally nutmegged the salad instead of the soup.
meanings.sent4: She nutmegs her oatmeal every morning, creating a delightful aroma.
meanings.sent5: The baker carefully nutmegs the dough, enhancing its flavor.
